FuncDef: The display client-option reply-option command displays an option that is sent as a reply to a user request.
CLIs: display [ ip pool name <name> ] client-option reply-option

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an address pool.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters and can contain digits, letters, underscores (_), and periods (.), but not spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ip pool name hw client-option 60 reply-option
ExtraInfo: To view information about the option that will be sent as a reply to a client option, run the display client-option reply-option command.
